genericChalices.name: Giant's Cradle Grail
genericChalices.description:
Obtainable after defeating 7 Nightlords, excluding Heolstor the Nightlord.
Purchased from the Small Jar Bazaar shop at the Roundtable Hold for 3000 Murk.

genericChalices.name: Sacred Erdtree Grail
genericChalices.description:
Obtainable after defeating Heolstor the Nightlord.
Purchased from the Small Jar Bazaar shop at the Roundtable Hold for 3000 Murk.

genericChalices.name: Spirit Shelter Grail
genericChalices.description:
Obtainable after defeating 4 different Nightlords.
Purchased from the Small Jar Bazaar shop at the Roundtable Hold for 3000 Murk.

genericChalices.name: Scadutree Grail
genericChalices.description:
Obtainable after defeating Dreglord.
Purchased from the Small Jar Bazaar shop at the Roundtable Hold for 3000 Murk.
